text: if you're planning to get the new iPhone
there's a better way to buy it we used
to all get our phones through our
wireless carrier because they would give
them to us for free or at a cheaper
price in exchange for signing up for a
two-year contract but that's not the way
we buy phones anymore so it presents
this new problem how do i buy it there's
a few things you need to know no matter
where you go the new iphone price is the
price you're probably not gonna pay a
thousand dollars or whatever it is out
of pocket upfront
you're probably gonna pay monthly
overtime you can of course do it through
your wireless carrier which is where 75%
of people still go to get their new
iPhones or you can do it through Apple's
upgrade program it's called the iPhone
upgrade program but it's a little bit
misleading because it doesn't really
mean that you have to upgrade your
iPhone every year usually most people
would get the phone in September hold on
to it for a year and then either get the
new iPhone when it comes out or keep
making the payments on your current
iPhone if you love it until you've paid
the full balance then once you have it's
your phone the key point here is if
you're going to pay for your phone over
time through installment payments it is
far better to do that through Apple than
to go to your wireless carrier for many
reasons the installment plans ultimately
they're all pretty much the same so if
you wouldn't buy your laptop from your
internet provider why would you buy your
cell phone from your wireless carrier
you're so much better off going to the
store that actually makes the phone so
that if you have any problems or you
need tech support moving forward that's
where you go that's your wireless
carrier they can't help you with the
phone they just have to outsource it to
somebody else and it's just a matter of
fact that Apple care is by far the best
warranty program for your phone you will
get the quickest repairs it's the only
warranty program Consumer Reports
recommends it's really a good program
now Apple care doesn't cover you for a
lost or stolen phone so you're gonna
need to make sure that you're renters or
homeowners insurance does cover your
phone because this is a very expensive
it
if you need a new phone and you could
get last year's model it's gonna be
cheaper you'll find a great deal on it
but for my money I like the convenience
of paying monthly upgrading once a year
and knowing that if I drop it it's
apples problem not mine
[Music]
